title: 【有將軍澳便裝警員於將軍澳行動期間受襲】

replies.msg:
【有便裝警員於將軍澳行動期間受襲】

晚上七時半左右，兩名在將軍澳執勤的便裝警員，被暴徒圍堵。兩名警員嘗試撤離現場，但被暴徒追打。有暴徒以硬物不斷擊打該兩名便裝警員的頭部。

兩名警員均頭部受傷流血，他們被送往將軍澳醫院治理，送院時清醒。

警方對暴徒冷血行為深感憤怒，會全力調查暴徒惡行。

At around 7:30 PM, two plainclothes police officers were assaulted by mobs of rioters in Tseung Kwan O. Rioters used hard objects to bludgeon the heads of the police officers.
Both police officers suffered head injuries.

They were conveyed to Tseung Kwan O Hospital for medical treatment in a conscious state.

We were infuriated by rioters’ brutal assaults. The police will carry out thorough investigations against all violent acts.
